```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
ces <- read_csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ces, aes(x=white_percent, y = ces_3_0_score)) + geom_hex() + labs(x = "Percent White", y = "CalEnviroScreen (CES) Score")+
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "darkorchid4", high = "magenta")+
  theme_minimal()
```
